project.name: Orion Edge Gateway
project.scope: API gateway, rate limiting, auth integration

sections.title: Project Context & Objectives
sections.goal: Understand the high-level goals, constraints, and success criteria for Orion Edge Gateway from both PM and Security perspectives.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through the main objectives for Orion Edge Gateway and how they align with Novereon's mission?
What are the key constraints—technical, regulatory, or organizational—that shape this project?
How do you define success for the Build phase in this context?

sections.title: User Journeys & Edge Cases
sections.goal: Explore typical and atypical user interaction patterns with the API gateway, including rate limiting and authentication flows.
sample_questions: What are the primary user journeys that the gateway needs to support?
Can you tell me about any rare but critical edge cases you anticipate?
How do rate limits and authentication mechanisms interplay in these scenarios?

sections.title: Security & Compliance Integration
sections.goal: Investigate how security requirements, especially mTLS and auth integration, are being incorporated into the design and build processes.
sample_questions: What threat models are you applying to the API gateway's design?
How do you ensure compliance with POL-SEC-001 Least Privilege & JIT Access?
Can you walk me through the resolution steps for ticket GW-4821 and their impact on design?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify dependencies between Orion Edge Gateway and other projects like Aegis IAM or Nimbus Observability.
sample_questions: Which other projects or systems does Orion Edge Gateway depend on for authentication and logging?
How do these dependencies affect your delivery timelines and risk profile?
Can you share an example of a cross-project issue and how it was resolved?

sections.title: Risk Management & Trade-offs
sections.goal: Discuss major trade-offs made during the Build phase, including performance vs. security, and their implications.
sample_questions: Were there any situations where you had to choose between performance targets and security controls?
What evidence or metrics did you use to make these decisions?
How are these trade-offs documented and communicated to stakeholders?

sections.title: Future Outlook & Continuous Improvement
sections.goal: Gather insights on planned improvements, monitoring, and feedback loops post-Build phase.
sample_questions: What are the next steps after the Build phase completes?
How will you monitor p95 latency against SLA-ORI-02 in production?
What feedback mechanisms are in place to iterate on the gateway's UX and security?
